imdb.title: Akai kôdan Zillion
imdb.plot: Invaders have arrived on a second Earth called Maris in the year 2387. The natives are helpless as their weapons are ineffective against the invaders. The exception is three weapons containing the element Zillion. The Maris army f...

episodes.title: Attack the Enemy of the High Skies!
episodes.plot: JJ learns that the Zillion guns, being the product of a mysterious civilization, cannot be analyzed or duplicated by human science. Noza launches an attack on the energy control center in Gloria City.

episodes.title: Trap of the Shapeless Ninja Squadron
episodes.plot: Baron Ricks, supreme commander of the Noza forces, runs a computer analysis of the White Nuts, and learns that Zillion is the secret to their power. Ricks attacks an important base to draw out the White Nuts.

episodes.title: Take Off, Tricharger
episodes.plot: A secret Nozan weapons factory is discovered in a snowbound mountain gorge. The White Nuts, equipped with new vehicles, are sent in to strike, but are left in the lurch when their support unit is ordered elsewhere.

episodes.title: Attack! Triple Shoot
episodes.plot: Apple and Champ follow JJ in having their Zillions remade. While on a remote island for a weapons test, a Nozan battleship called the Sea Fang appears and begins attacking the White Nuts, forcing them underwater.
